title: Join
explanation: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.

title: El Pollo Loco
explanation: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and poison bottles to fight against el pollo loco.

title: Ring of Fire
explanation: A small online card game inspired by the popular drinking card game, that works on multiple devices.

title: Pok√©dex
explanation: Based on the PokeAPI a simple library that provides and catalogues pokemon information.
